alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 12:59PM CDT until July 21 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CRAIGHEAD...POINSETT...NORTHWESTERN CRITTENDEN AND NORTHEASTERN CROSS COUNTIES... At 1258 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Harrisburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Marked Tree, Earle, Harrisburg, Lepanto, Bay, Caraway, Tyronza, Cherry Valley, Greenfield, Three Forks, Payneway, Apt, Valley View, Weona Junction, Gum Point, Promised Land, Bay Village and Coldwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
